# Change: 'createSynonym'

Creates a synonym

## Available Attributes ##

<table class='attribs'>
<tr><th>Name</th><th>Description</th></tr>

## SQL Generated From Above Sample (SQL Server)

{% highlight sql %}
CREATE SYNONYM [A String] FOR [A String];


{% endhighlight %}
